output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to the given criteria:
1. Has CMF: No CMF number is present in this post.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, it directly mentions "George Simion" who is one of the presidential candidates (Position 2 - Alianța pentru Unirea Românilor).
3. Addresses wide population: Yes, this is a paid advertisement with a significant reach (80,000-89,999 impressions) and large estimated audience size (>1 million).
4. Electoral objective: The title "George Simion explică cum se cucerește un popor" (George Simion explains how to conquer a people) appears to be politically charged content featuring a presidential candidate. While the full content isn't visible, the title alone suggests political messaging that could influence voters' perceptions.
5. Journalism: This doesn't appear to be journalistic content. The format and title suggest it's more of a political message or statement rather than news reporting.
6. Personal opinion: This is not presented as a personal opinion but rather as a platform for a presidential candidate to present their views.
The timing of this ad (created on November 22, 2024, with no end date) means it would continue running during the electoral silence period and election day, which is prohibited for presidential election-related content.

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This appears to be electoral propaganda because: - It features a presidential candidate directly - Has significant reach through paid promotion - Continues to run during the prohibited period - The message appears to be political in nature - The title suggests influence over public opinion
conclusion.message-for-police: 4media.INFO, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin difuzarea unui material de propaganda electorala dupa incheierea perioadei legale de campanie, respectiv dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024. Materialul, cu ID-ul 902982898467615, il prezinta pe candidatul prezidential George Simion intr-un material video intitulat "George Simion explică cum se cucerește un popor", avand un caracter vadit electoral si potential de influentare a alegatorilor, fiind promovat activ prin reclama platita pe Facebook si Instagram, cu un impact semnificativ de peste 80.000 de afisari. Materialul continua sa fie distribuit activ in perioada de restrictie electorala, incalcand astfel prevederile legale privind interdictia propagandei electorale dupa incheierea campaniei.
